p: The comparison of three reference samples is first discussed: the raw powder directly issued from the polyol synthesis; “blue powder”, the sample obtained from a post-annealing treatment under air at 600 °C; “yellow powder”, of the as-prepared raw powder, and the sample resulting from a post-annealing treatment under argon (with pO 2 ≅ 10 −5 atm) at 600 °C; “black powder”.
